channel.title: Can't reconnect to server
channel.description: Hello , I am hosting with hamachi. Its all right , every1 can connect etc , but when they log out , they can't connect again exept when i restart server, my runserver says : Clienthandler: rejected from (the connectors ip) Clienthandler: accepted from (the connectors ip) and even i cannot reconnect... help please... BTW i will not download new source , i've worked fr like 1 full month with this one...

item.title: Can't reconnect to server
item.dc:creator: @kristo_21 kristo 21
item.description:
@kristo_21 wrote:

Hello , I am hosting with hamachi. Its all right , every1 can connect etc , but when they log out , they can’t connect again exept when i restart server, my runserver says :
Clienthandler: rejected from (the connectors ip)
Clienthandler: accepted from (the connectors ip)
and even i cannot reconnect… help please…
BTW i will not download new source , i’ve worked fr like 1 full month with this one…

Read full topic
